sandy.materials.attributes.ALightAttributes

type

sandy.materials.attributes.LightAttributes
sandy.materials.attributes.PhongAttributes
ABSTRACT CLASS - super class for all light attributes.

This class should not be directly instatiated, but sub classed.
The ALightAttributes class implements Blinn flavor of Phong reflection model.

@author makc @author Niel Drummond - haXe port @author Russell Weir - haXe port @version 3.1 @date 13.12.2007

Constructor

new()

Instance Variables

ambient(__getAmbient,__setAmbient) : Float

Ambient reflection factor.

Note that since geometry of sprites is unknown, this is going to be the only lighting setting affecting them, so you would typically need to set it to bigger value than you would for shapes.

@default 0.3

diffuse(__getDiffuse,__setDiffuse) : Float

Diffuse reflection factor. @default 1.0

flags(__getFlags,null) : Int

Flags for the attribute.

gloss(__getGloss,__setGloss) : Float

Specular exponent. @default 5.0

specular(__getSpecular,__setSpecular) : Float

Specular reflection factor. @default 0.0

Instance Methods

begin(p_oScene : sandy.core.Scene3D) : Void

Method called before the display list rendering. This is the common place for this attribute to precompute things

draw(p_oGraphics : flash.display.Graphics, p_oPolygon : sandy.core.data.Polygon, p_oMaterial : sandy.materials.Material, p_oScene : sandy.core.Scene3D) : Void

Draws light on shape.

drawOnSprite(p_oSprite : sandy.core.scenegraph.Sprite2D, p_oMaterial : sandy.materials.Material, p_oScene : sandy.core.Scene3D) : Void

Draws light on sprite.

finish(p_oScene : sandy.core.Scene3D) : Void

Method called right after the display list rendering This is the place to remove and dispose memory if necessary.

init(p_oPolygon : sandy.core.data.Polygon) : Void

Allows to proceed to an initialization to know when the polyon isn't lined to the material, look at #unlink

unlink(p_oPolygon : sandy.core.data.Polygon) : Void

Remove all the initialization opposite of init
